properties.description: A dataset
The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
properties.title: Originator

properties.description: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
properties.title: Published Date

properties.description: The name by which the data set is known.
properties.title: Dataset Title

properties.description: Other information required to complete the citation.
properties.title: Other

properties.description: A characterization of the data set, including its intended use and limitations.
properties.title: Description

properties.description: A brief narrative summary of the data set.
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: A summary of the intentions with which the data set was developed.
properties.title: Purpose

properties.description: Other descriptive information about the data set.
properties.title: Supplemental Information

properties.description: Time period(s) for which the data set corresponds to the currentness reference.
properties.title: Time Period of Content

properties.description: Use the format: 19000101 for Dec 1, 1900.
properties.title: Begin Date

properties.description: Use the format: 19000101 for Dec 1, 1900.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: The basis on which the time period of content information is determined.
properties.title: Currentness Reference

properties.description: The state of and maintenance information for the data set.
properties.title: Status

properties.description: The state of the data set.
properties.title: Progress

properties.description: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.
properties.title: Maintenance and Update Frequency

properties.description: The geographic areal domain of the data set.
properties.title: Spatial Domain

properties.description: Short description of the geographic areal domain of the dataset.
properties.title: Description of Geographic Extent

properties.description: the limits of coverage of a data set expressed by latitude and longitude values in the order western-most, eastern-most, northern-most, and southern-most. For data sets that include a complete band of latitude around the earth, the West Bounding Coordinate shall be assigned the value -180.0, and the East Bounding Coordinate shall be assigned the value 180.0
properties.title: Bounding Coordinates

properties.description: Western-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.
properties.title: West Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in longitude.
properties.title: East Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Northern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.
properties.title: North Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of coverage expressed in latitude.
properties.title: South Bounding Coordinate

properties.description: Words or phrases summarizing an aspect of the data set.
properties.title: Keywords

properties.description: Subjects covered by the data set.
properties.title: Theme

properties.description: reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords
properties.title: Theme Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.
properties.title: Theme Keyword

properties.description: Geographic locations characterized by the data set.
properties.title: Place

properties.description: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of place keywords.
properties.title: Place Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: The geographic name of a location covered by this data set.
properties.title: Place Keyword

properties.description: Layered, vertical locations characterized by the data set.
properties.title: Stratum

properties.description: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of stratum keywords.
properties.title: Stratum Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: The name of a vertical location used to describe the locations covered by a data set.
properties.title: Stratum Keyword

properties.description: Time period(s) characterized by the data set.
properties.title: Temporal

properties.description: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of temporal keywords.
properties.title: Temporal Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: The name of a time period covered by a data set.
properties.title: Temporal Keyword

properties.description: Information on the taxa (1 or more) included in the data set, including keywords, taxonomic system and coverage information, and taxonomic classification system.
properties.title: Taxonomy

properties.description: Taxonomic ranks or common groups characterized by the data set.
properties.title: Keywords/Taxon

properties.description: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or similar authoritative source of taxonomic keywords.
properties.title: Taxonomic Keyword Thesaurus

properties.description: Common-use words or phrases describing the taxonomy covered by the data set.
properties.title: Taxonomic Keywords

properties.description: Documentation of taxonomic sources, procedures, and treatments.
properties.title: Taxonomic System

properties.description: Information about the classification system or authority used.
properties.title: Classification System

properties.description: The name of an organization or individual referenced in the citation.
properties.title: Classification Citation Origin

properties.description: Publish date of the Classification Citation.
properties.title: Classification Citation Publish Date

properties.description: A Citation for the classification system or authority used, this might include monographs or online data sets such as ITIS.
properties.title: Classification Citation Title

properties.description: The format of the Classification Citation.
properties.title: Classification Citation Form

properties.description: Description of the methods used for the taxonomic identification.
properties.title: Taxonomic Procedures

properties.description: Information concerning the proportions and treatment of unidentified materials.
properties.title: Taxonomic Completeness

properties.description: Information about the range of taxa addressed in the data set or collection.
properties.title: Taxonomic Classification

properties.description: The name of the taxonomic rank.
properties.title: Taxonomic Rank Name

properties.description: The name representing the taxonomic rank of the taxon being described.
properties.title: Taxonomic Rank Value

properties.description: Specification of applicable common name.
properties.title: Applicable Common Name

properties.description: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing the data set. These include any access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the data set.
properties.title: Access Constraints

properties.description: A characterization of the data set, including its intended use and limitations.
properties.title: Use Constraints

properties.description: Recognition of those who contributed to the data set.
properties.title: Data Set Credit

properties.description: Handling restrictions imposed on the data set because of national security, privacy, or other concerns.
properties.title: Security Information

properties.description: Name of the classification system.
properties.title: Security Classification System

properties.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the data set.
properties.title: Security Classification

properties.description: Additional information about the restrictions on handling the data set.
properties.title: Security Handling Description

properties.description: A description of the data set in the producer's processing environment, including items such as the name of the software (including version), the computer operating system, file name (including host-, path-, and filenames), and the data set size.
properties.title: Native Data Set Environment

properties.description: A general assessment of the quality of the data set.
properties.title: Data Quality Information

properties.description: An assessment of the accuracy of the identification of entities and assignment of attribute values in the data set.
properties.title: Attribute Accuracy

properties.description: An assessment of the accuracy of the identification of entities and assignment of attribute values in the data set.
properties.title: Attribute Accuracy

properties.description: An explanation of the fidelity of relationships in the data set and tests used.
properties.title: Logical Consistency Report

properties.description: Information about omissions, selection criteria, generalization, definitions used, and other rules used to derive the data set
properties.title: Completeness Report

properties.description: An assessment of the accuracy of the positions of spatial objects.
properties.title: Positional Accuracy

properties.description: An estimate of accuracy of the horizontal positions of the spatial objects.
properties.title: Horizontal Positional Accuracy

properties.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.
properties.title: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Report

properties.description: An estimate of accuracy of the vertical positions in the data set.
properties.title: Vertical Positional Accuracy

properties.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.
properties.title: Vertical Positional Accuracy Report

properties.description: Information about the events, parameters, and source data which constructed the data set, and information about the responsible parties.
properties.title: Lineage

properties.description: Information about a single step of field and/or laboratory work.
properties.title: Methodology

properties.description: The type of methodology being documented, such as field or laboratory methodology.
properties.title: Methodology Type

properties.description: Equivalent to "Materials and Methods" in a journal article. Describe the physical methods used to gather data, the experimental design, sample frequency, treatments or strata, statistical and spatial design of the sampling, and sample completeness, representativeness, and biases. For example, in a bird survey, relevant elements would include the methods used to detect species occurrences (casual sightings, transects, focal point surveys, vocalizations, mist nets), whether or not evidence of breeding activity was required, descriptions of the habitat strata in a stratified design, and known biases (e.g., non-territorial birds were undersampled, and some juveniles could not be identified to species.)
properties.title: Methodology Description

properties.description: Information about a single event.
properties.title: Process Step

properties.description: An explanation of the event and related parameters or tolerances.
properties.title: Process Description

properties.description: The date when the event was completed.
properties.title: Process Date

properties.description: Area of a data set obstructed by clouds, expressed as a percentage of the spatial extent. (0 <= Cloud Cover <= 100 "Unknown")
properties.title: Cloud Cover

properties.description: The mechanism used to represent spatial information in the data set.
properties.title: Spatial Data Organization Information

properties.description: Name of types of geographic features, addressing schemes, or other means through which locations are referenced in the data set.
properties.title: Indirect Spatial Reference

properties.description: The system of objects used to represent space in the data set.
properties.title: Direct Spatial Reference Method

properties.description: The types and numbers of raster spatial objects in the data set.
properties.title: Raster Object Information

properties.description: Raster spatial objects used to locate zero-, two-, or three-dimensional locations in the data set.
properties.title: Raster Object Type

properties.description: The maximum number of raster objects along the ordinate (y) axis. For use with rectangular raster objects.
properties.title: Row Count

properties.description: The maximum number of raster objects along the abscissa (x) axis. For use with rectangular raster objects.
properties.title: Column Count

properties.description: The maximum number of raster objects along the vertical (z) axis. For use with rectangular volumetric raster objects (voxels).
properties.title: Vertical Count

properties.description: The description of the reference frame for, and the means to encode, coordinates in the data set.
properties.title: Spatial Reference Information

properties.description: The reference frame or system from which linear or angular quantities are measured and assigned to the position that a point occupies.
properties.title: Horizontal Coordinate System Definition

properties.description: The quantities of latitude and longitude which define the position of a point on the Earth's surface with respect to a reference spheroid.
properties.title: Geographic

properties.description: -- the minimum difference between two adjacent latitude values expressed in Geographic Coordinate Units of measure.
properties.title: Latitude Resolution

properties.description: The minimum difference between two adjacent longitude values expressed in Geographic Coordinate Units of measure.
properties.title: Longitude Resolution

properties.description: Units of measure used for the latitude and longitude values.
properties.title: Geographic Coordinate Units

properties.description: Parameters for the shape of the earth.
properties.title: Geodetic Model

properties.description: The identification given to the reference system used for defining the coordinates of points.
properties.title: Horizontal Datum Name

properties.description: Identification given to established representations of the Earth's shape.
properties.title: Ellipsoid Name

properties.description: Radius of the equatorial axis of the ellipsoid.
properties.title: Semi-major Axis

properties.description: The denominator of the ratio of the difference between the equatorial and polar radii of the ellipsoid when the numerator is set to 1.
properties.title: Denominator of Flattening Ratio

properties.description: The reference frame or system from which vertical distances (altitudes or depths) are measured.
properties.title: Vertical Coordinate System Definition

properties.description: the reference frame or system from which altitudes (elevations) are measured.
properties.title: Altitude System Definition

properties.description: The identification given to the surface taken as the surface of reference from which altitudes are measured.
properties.title: Altitude Datum Name

properties.description: The minimum distance possible between two adjacent altitude values, expressed in Altitude Distance Units of Measure.
properties.title: Elevation

properties.description: Units in which altitudes are recorded.
properties.title: Altitude Distance Units

properties.default_value: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates
properties.description: Altitude Encoding Method
properties.title: Altitude Encoding Method

properties.description: the reference frame or system from which depths are measured.
properties.title: Depth System Definition

properties.description: The identification given to the surface taken as the surface of reference from which depths are measured.
properties.title: Depth Datum Name

properties.description: The minimum distance possible between two adjacent depth values, expressed in Depth Distance Units of measure.
properties.title: Depth Resolution

properties.description: Units in which depths are recorded.
properties.title: Depth Distance Units

properties.description: The means used to encode depths.

index.key: Explicit depth coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

options.index: Explicit depth coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

properties.title: Depth Encoding Method

properties.description: Details about the information content of the data set, including the entity types, their attributes, and the domains from which attribute values may be assigned.
properties.title: Entity and Attribute Information

properties.description: Description of the entities, attributes, attribute values, and related characteristics encoded in the data set.
properties.title: Detailed Description

properties.description: The name of the entity type.
properties.title: Entity Type Label

properties.description: The description of the entity type.
properties.title: Entity Type Definition

properties.description: The authority of the definition.
properties.title: Entity Type Definition Source

properties.description: A defined characteristic of an entity.
properties.title: Attribute

properties.description: The name of the Attribute.
properties.title: Attribute Label

properties.description: The description of the attribute.
properties.title: Attribute Definition

properties.description: The authority of the definition.
properties.title: Attribute Definition Source

properties.description: The valid values that can be assigned for an attribute.
properties.title: Attribute Domain Values

properties.description: The members of an established set of valid values.
properties.title: Enumerated Domain

properties.description: The name or label of a member of the set.
properties.title: Enumerated Domain Value

properties.description: The description of the value.
properties.title: Enumerated Domain Value Definition

properties.description: The authority of the definition
properties.title: Enumerated Domain Value Definition Source

properties.description: Earliest or only date for which the attribute values are current. In cases when a range of dates are provided, this is the earliest date for which the information is valid.
properties.title: Beginning Date of Attribute Values

properties.description: Latest date for which the information is current. Used in cases when a range of dates are provided.
properties.title: Ending Date of Attribute Values

properties.description: An assessment of the accuracy of the assignment of attribute values.
properties.title: Attribute Value Accuracy Information

properties.description: An estimate of the accuracy of the assignment of attribute values.
properties.title: Attribute Value Accuracy

properties.description: The definition of the Attribute Value Accuracy measure and units, and a description of how the estimate was derived.
properties.title: Attribute Value Accuracy Explanation

properties.description: The frequency with which attribute values are added.
properties.title: Attribute Measurement Frequency

properties.description: Summary of, and citation to detailed description of, the information content of the data set.
properties.title: Overview Description

properties.description: Detailed summary of the information contained in a data set.
properties.title: Entity and Attribute Overview

properties.description: Reference to the complete description of the entity types, attributes, and attribute values for the data set.
properties.title: Entity and Attribute Detail Citation

properties.description: Information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the data set.
properties.title: Distribution Information

properties.description: The party from whom the dataset may be obtained.
properties.title: Distributor

properties.description: The party responsible for the distribution of the dataset.
properties.title: Distributor Contact Person

properties.description: The identifier by which the distributor knows the data set.
properties.title: Resource Description

properties.description: Statement of the liability assumed by the distributor.
properties.title: Distribution Liability

properties.description: Description of custom distribution services available, and the terms and conditions for obtaining these services.
properties.title: Custom Order Process

properties.description: Description of any technical capabilities that the consumer must have to use the data set in the form(s) provided by the distributor.
properties.title: Technical Prerequisites

properties.description: Information on the currentness of the metadata information, and the responsible party.
properties.title: Metadata Reference Information

properties.description: The date that the metadata were created or last updated.
properties.title: Metadata Date

properties.description: The date of the latest review of the metadata entry.
properties.title: Metadata Review Date

properties.description: The date by which the metadata entry should be reviewed.
properties.title: Metadata Future Review Date

properties.description: The party responsible for the metadata information.
properties.title: Metadata Contact

properties.description: The party responsible for the metadata.
properties.title: Metadata Contact Person

properties.description: The name of the contact person's organization.
properties.title: Metadata Contact Organization

properties.default_value: FGDC Biological Data Profile of the Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
properties.description: The name of the metadata standard used to document the data set.
properties.title: Metadata Standard Name

properties.description: Identification of the version of the metadata standard used to document the data set.
properties.title: Metadata Standard Version

properties.description: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing the metadata.
properties.title: Metadata Access Constraints

properties.description: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for using the metadata.
properties.title: Metadata Access Constraints

properties.description: Handling restrictions imposed on the metadata because of national security, privacy, or other concerns.
properties.title: Metadata Security Information

properties.description: Name of the classification system for the metadata.
properties.title: Metadata Security Classification System

properties.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the metadata.
properties.title: Metadata Security Classification

properties.description: Additional information about the restrictions on handling the metadata.
properties.title: Metadata Security Handling Description
